main event: A civilian and a police officer reported seeing a circular-shaped unidentified flying object in Loogootee, Indiana, on April 6, 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed flying towards the Crane area for about 10-15 seconds,It hovered in the sky before disappearing behind a hill,The object was described as illuminated and did not appear to be a known type of aircraft,No trail or exhaust from the object was seen,The sighting occurred during dusk to dark conditions.
witness description: a civilian employee of NAD Crane and a local police officer
